# bounds

**Instance Property**

The drawing bounds of caption scenes.

## Declaration

```swift
var bounds: CGRect { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property value before drawing. The renderer uses the value in each call to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptionRenderer/render(in:for:)], until you change it to a new value.

## Configuring the renderer

- **captions**: The captions to render.
title: bounds
